books.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: The first book in the popular series about the young wizard Harry Potter, who discovers that he is a wizard and enters Hogwarts, the school of witchcraft and wizardry.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A classic book about a racially unfair trial in small-town America in the 1930s.

books.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
books.author: Douglas Adams
books.description: The book describes the adventures of the unfortunate Zeman Arthur Dent, who goes on a space vacation and searches for the meaning of life.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian novel that takes place in an increasingly totalitarian society where surveillance of citizens is everywhere and freedom of speech is forbidden.

books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: The story of Jay Gatsby, a mysterious rich man who throws a decadent party and tries to win back the love of his life.
